website_summaries.verdict: An extremely affordable iPad Air case that comes with a lifetime warranty that the company is happy to uphold.
pros: A slim, lightweight, and sturdy case made out of synthetic leather
Can use as a stand and includes a magnetic closure that works with the iPad's sleep and wake feature
Company offers great customer service and a lifetime warranty
cons: The plastic frame the iPad fits into can crack, but the company is happy to offer replacements

customer_reviews.title: Seller worked hard on my behalf to make sure I was happy!
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied customer - I ordered this case understanding the old saw: "you get what you pay for". The case arrived quickly and a small portion of the frame around the iPad broke as I installed the case! I didn't go all crazy, I simply explained my problem to the seller. They bent over backwards to replace my item and got a new one to me in no time flat. IMHO, integrity and commitment to your customers are at least as important as your products in the long run. I have my new case and it's working fine - & I am left feeling like a valued customer. 'Nuff said.
customer_reviews.author: TN

customer_reviews.title: Mother loves it!
customer_reviews.text: The iPad my mother had a pretty ratty and poorly fitting case, so I decided to get her a new one. Searching AMZ with the exact model tablet, this unit came up. For this nice price, and delivered to her door in 2 days, I figured why not? It arrived on-time and the iPad snapped perfectly in place. My mother is so appreciative! It's nice fit, decent quality material/workmanship, and the great price makes this a real winner. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: Fatal flaws
customer_reviews.text: I have now purchased 3 of these cases. They seem well made, at least in the beginning. Within months, the plastic cracks in the exact same areas on all the cases, and the iPad becomes loose and will fall out if you are not careful. After the first one, I was willing to give them the benefit of the doubt, but now after having all 3 fail with the same problem, I'm done with these. Too bad, because other than this obviously fatal problem, they seem like good cases. But not really. Trying one of the Fintie cases next.
customer_reviews.author: AwardB

customer_reviews.title: Better than Apple case
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace the similar-designed Apple iPad case that I've had for 5 years. That case had become very worn and damaged to the point where it barely held the iPad in place. I was looking for a new version of the same case I'd had, and this one comes very close, but is more sturdy in construction, and retains the iPad more securely with a "snap" into place, rather than a push-in and snug fit, as my previous case had. This one is also about 1/3 the price of the Apple case, which I'm not sure is even made anymore (discontinued in favor of the front-cover flap only.
customer_reviews.author: BAH

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought this type of case before for my other iPads and they always feel good in my hands. Doesn’t make my iPad feel larger than it should and it’s sleek looking too which I like. Has protected my iPad already from a drop and something dropping on it as well. Only thing I would say that I don’t like is the hinge part of the cover that covers the iPads screen is a little flimsy. I feel like it might tear half the time. Other than that, it’s a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Thu Tran

customer_reviews.title: iPad Air case
customer_reviews.text: After a very short time, I am pleased with the case,its quality and ease of use. During purchase review, I was pleased to see specific models matched to the case, i.e. A 14--. Of continuing import will be the longevity of the case in order that I do not have to re-buy as I have had to do with another in the past. After a short time, I find the product less than satisfactory and as stated in my initial review longevity would be key. Today, the case has cracked at the on/off switch,at top, and the narrow piece closest to the screen face. has now broken. Not at all what I anticipated !!
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Brown

customer_reviews.title: Brittle material chips and cracks
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and hold, but after only about a week of use I noticed little cracks and chips appearing. I still have the same case after several months, but the corners are all chipped and cracked, and I am really not hard on my devices at all. The plastic is very brittle and will break over time regardless of how it's treated. Other than that, it was the right size and fit well and does everything I needed it to--it just looks a little ghetto with all of the chips and cracks around the corners.
customer_reviews.author: Wilstrong

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, questionable protection
customer_reviews.text: The rubber coating on the screen cover of my my iPad Air (1st Gen) case is peeling off (it lasted seven years), it is a great case with great protection but no longer made. I bought this as a replacement and am really disappointed. The case itself is very thin plastic, the "bumpers" at the corners don't protrude enough to protect the screen, and the folding screen cover (cardboard inner layer) is half the thickness of the one that is peeling. I wouldn't expect it to provide much protection at all.
customer_reviews.author: David Kenward

customer_reviews.title: Plastic corners broke off
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had the cover for several years of mild indoor use, so certainly got my money’s worth. Still I was surprised to find bits of hard blue plastic on my living room floor, remnants of 2 corners holding my iPad in place. Also, as easy and handy as the cover and easel-like propping feature is, note that this ONLY works in landscape mode. When you use the iPad vertically, you are back to just flat use. (You might consider a metal stand, handy for both portrait and landscape use.)
customer_reviews.author: MO

customer_reviews.title: Had to re-purchase but new one seems to fit better.
customer_reviews.text: This is a re-review of the product. I purchased my first one in 12-2016, and it started having problems within months (can't remember the specific time). By late 2017 parts of the hard plastic molded cover started chipping off, and sometimes my iPad would come out of the case. The replacement that I received a couple of weeks ago is different. It no longer has to snap in place to hold the iPad (I think that is what caused the other one to crack and chip). It seems like a better fit. Hopefully it will last longer than the old one. However, for the price even the old one was a good value. I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: A1 Saucy

customer_reviews.title: Decent iPad cover
customer_reviews.text: We have an iPad first gen (A1474) and the old cover wore out. Everything is fine with this cover but it does not cover the entire iPad. The cut-out at the bottom where the slot for charging and the speakers are does not cover the front outer edge. We have three over iPads and they all have the extra strip of material at the cut-out. Other than that, it works fine, but it could have been better. I blame myself for not noticing it in the pictures/description.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: The stand feature is not stable
customer_reviews.text: The stand feature is weak. The magnet that is supposed to keep the little triangle together to make the stand work is flimsy unless it’s perfectly still on a perfectly flat solid surface. This is honestly really annoying. I have had a case with the same build for many years, but the covering was peeling and the plastic cracking. I trusted this case with the same mechanisms would work, but this one is so much weaker. I have ordered a case from another brand to compare and will probably return whichever one sucks less.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Broke after only two short years...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this two years ago and it has been my absolute favorite case! It did start to crack and break apart after only 24 months of constant day-to-day use. I used it as a stand regularly to watch videos; used the typing format when it's sitting on my lap. I've taken it camping, to work, in the car, and in my home. Opening/closing the flap did a superb job turning on and off the screen. After two short years, it did start to crack without being dropped and eventually would not hold the iPad anymore. However, I would not take it breaking after two years of use as a negative. Definitely RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: FK

customer_reviews.title: iPad Case has a nice slick and yet soft rubber feel
customer_reviews.text: I love the way the iPad case feel (the back part). The only one issue I have is that the left side of the iPad is not completely covered due to the design of the front cover so that the cover can close. If I drop the iPad on the left side onto a corner or something sharp the iPad could get damaged because it’s not fully protected. I love the magnetic closing feature and the feel of the back side The back cover does absorb oily fingers and you can see smudges but it’s not too bad. Most iPad cases don’t cover every corner and this one does so that’s why I chose this one
customer_reviews.author: Review Guru

customer_reviews.title: 3 of 4 corners broken. Not very sturdy or protective.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this at the end of October 2016. It is now April 2017 and I just purchased a new case from someone else. This case looks and feels good and fits well - hence the 1 star. My iPad fell off the bed onto a carpet and the corner cracked and broke off. The break actually scratched and damaged the corner of the iPad. At this time with normal use and 'one' drop mentioned above, three of the four corners are broken. This case is not very practical or sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Cyrus R. Mody

customer_reviews.title: Item appears to be fine, factory seal was broken
customer_reviews.text: Just received the iPad case today. I opened the package and at first glance the box looked like it had been open. Upon further inspection the original factory seal was cut through and a second seal was placed over the original one. The iPad case looks okay and shows no sign of wear and tear so I’ll keep it. When making a purchase and you see a factory seal that has been removed or cut it makes you feel like the item isn’t new.
customer_reviews.author: j walker

customer_reviews.title: Got it yesterday- So far, Okay!
customer_reviews.text: I got this yesterday. I was a little skeptical from the reviews about their iPads not fitting properly. I used a little force and heard a click. Then I had to use a lot of energy to take it out. So I'm feeling good about the fit. What I am concerned about is the back resting thing. So basically the front cover folds up and makes the screen stand up. It's barely an angle and I'm very scared as to when it fall face down. Let's hope it doesn't break my iPad. Also the finish isn't amazing. But I guess its a decent material for $10.
customer_reviews.author: Dolonchapa Chakraborty

customer_reviews.title: Seemed good but Zero Durability
customer_reviews.text: When I first got this case I was impressed with how nice it seemed. The cover that goes over the screen it sturdy and does its job well. I purchased this is in December of 2014, and with very minimal use of the case and my iPad (mostly light use on the couch at home) it already needs to be replaced. Every corner of the plastic that holds the iPad has broken off slowly, no longer holding the device in.
customer_reviews.author: C. Kow

customer_reviews.title: Great Case, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I used this case to replace the ageing Apple case I bought when I bought my iPad a few years ago because the Apple case completely came apart. This case is designed exactly the same as the Apple case and it is about a third of the price of the Apple case - great value! This case functions perfectly- the sleep mode works great and it looks and feels like my old one, only newer and while not heavier, just more substantial. I love it! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Robert F. Valente

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but turns the iPad off when the lid completely opened and folded around the back
customer_reviews.text: Okay case, but when you fold the cover back completely it turns the iPad off again. I would have returned it, but it was for my ten-year-old and he didn't seem to mind. He gets around it by folding the last flap away from the edge of his iPad so that it doesn't tun the unit off when he opens it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a great case for the price
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what I need to replace an older, broken case. It fit perfectly and has the added bonus of allowing me to prop up my iPad in landscape mode for watching movies and videos. My only complaint is that when HOLDING my iPad in landscape mode the cover, which folds onto the back, come loose and curls over my hand. I wish the magnets that are supposed to hold it up were stronger.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Nice and convenience.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great case, second one I've purchased since my iPad. Unfortunately, I am sure I selected Rose Gold, but instead got a rich velvet black. The magnetic closure is what I like; No hassle. Since I only uses my iPad at home, the simplicity of this case is a welcome accessory and highly recommended. Case do have a nice feel and does not slip and slid. Would have rather my Rose Gold instead.
customer_reviews.author: Emerge_Victorious

customer_reviews.title: Falls over without my help!
customer_reviews.text: Sad. . . Cover folds into a triangular stand. But the bottom of the stand is only 3 inches. This makes the IPad very top heavy and it falls over. My last cover was a Devicewear brand. Amazon lists it as “Currently Unavailable”. Devicewear's site lists it for sale for $45.00! Ouch! I tolerate this stand but it is disappointing. I would not recommend this product. It makes me sad!
customer_reviews.author: raz

customer_reviews.title: I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the JETech case to replace an identical one I had used for several years. I was very pleased with the first one and I am more than happy with the second one. I am a retired professor and the first purchase received extensive use in and out of the classroom and traveling. As a result I did not hesitate to purchase an identical replacement; which was done more cosmetic purposes than anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sleek look, decent protection
customer_reviews.text: Product looks professional and sleek compared to other brands I've seen. I bought the black version and I used it on a work trip as a second monitor for my MacBook. The stability of the case when propping up the iPad can be a little wonky but as long as I didn't fiddle with it it was fine. Inexpensive, protects my iPad, on/off functionality, etc. Overall a great purchase that I'm really pleased with.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Magnet not right, won’t stand.
customer_reviews.text: The magnet does not work well to stand up the iPad. Magnet does not lock into place as nicely as my old iPad case with magnetic strip. The polarity of the magnet is the opposite to my old case, you have to fold it with the inner felt part to the outside. But, even when you do, the magnet is too weak and often the iPad will just fall over. Other than that, the build quality is actually quite nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t Last Very Long
customer_reviews.text: Bought this case in March 2019 and was initially happy with it but now notice it already had a crack in the top corner by the power button. Expected it to last much longer than this. Looking for a replacement now. Edit: now has cracks on the other corners also. This iPad has never been dropped and sits next to my recliner to use while watching TV? This case does not hold up well at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. IPad snapped right it. Great fit. The cover puts into sleep mode when closed, and walked up when opened. The lighter color covers do show dirt and smudges more than the darker colors.. but usually will wipe right off.. unless it's on the softer inside park on the cover. It's like a suade material so water not recommended. The cover folds up in a tri fold to sit tablet up. Since its magnetic, it easily slips down though if it's not sat on a hard surface. Overall, does what it's intended to do.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta Turner

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: For the price it’s a great product, but if you’re expecting this to feel like the Apple cover it doesn’t. It’s very light weight, if feels like it won’t last as long as the more expensive covers, but it really doesn’t need to. It looks good and it works. As long as the price stays in the $10-$20 range, it’s worth it. Any more than that save your money and buy a $40 Apple cover.
customer_reviews.author: jayjon81

customer_reviews.title: Corners crack and break off (x2) making it worthless: and I never dropped it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought one, hich lasted a year, the a corner cracked, so the ipad would slip out. Bought another, and it cracked after 3 weeks (neither time was it dropped, either). Save your money on multiple cheap cases, and buy rubber, something that doesn't crack just from being dropped into you purse with your lunch and wallet inside! Just missed the 30 day return, too bc was too busy with my son in mayo clinic all week to remember to worry about a return. Dern.
customer_reviews.author: B. Gildner

customer_reviews.title: Seller's Lack of durability costs stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm editing my review. After using this case for 6 months, the bottom corners broke off. Since the corners are what hold the Ipad in place, this makes the case non-functional. More and more pieces of the case have broken off. I reviewed the seller's description and it indicates that it has a lifetime warranty. So, I contacted the seller who has ignored my email. This makes the item significantly not as described! Thus I've reduced my stars to 1. Obviously the seller uses the lifetime warranty point to make sales with absolutely no intention of living up to his obligations. I will be contacting Amazon to see if they can help since the seller won't.
customer_reviews.author: Janjanjan

customer_reviews.title: Super case, great price!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had my iPad for quite a few years now but it still works great, no need to upgrade, however my case was literally falling apart. I was so glad to find a case for my older model. This case has a nice tight fit and love the soft blue color. The hardest part was trying to figure out what version of iPad I have! But once I determined that I have a 1st generation iPad Air, this one worked perfectly. I have no doubt it will hold up, and I’m very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Best Cover I have had
customer_reviews.text: Liked the cover from time I first slipped the iPad into it. Good fit, really like the multiple tilt adjustments. It closes nicely and stays closed while being transported. I use it daily but only have only had it a couple weeks, but I believe it will hold up for a long time to come. It does not swivel to be used in portrait position but never use it that way anyway. Openings are perfect for volume, charging etc. Was worth the price, had one of the cheap covers but only lasted a little over a year.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Similiar, but not the same as authentic Apple Ipad Air 1st Edition Case
customer_reviews.text: I like the open access to volume controls and power cable input. However, it does not fold exactly the same for viewing. Also, the case does not shut down or go into sleep mode when you close the cover if you have any current programs running. The authentic Ipad case has a magnet on the cover that would help close any programs running when you closed the cover. You have to do this manually with the JETech case. The back side of the case has a harder plastic cover which seems to slide more on hard surfaces. Overall, it does it's job holding my Ipad and protecting it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Low quality product twice.
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with the quality of this ipad case. First case was so tight that the corner broke. Very fragile never dropped it and it still broke with everyday use. Got a replacement through the warranty. Second version just cleaned it with soapy water and the next day the case to began deteriorate. Contacted customer service and was told it was my fault because I used soapy water. It not suggested to wiped with soap. I was suppose to use a wet tissue only. Not sure with Covid how a wet tissue will clean the case. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: this case is great
customer_reviews.text: This case is great! It does what it's supposed to do, cover the front of the ipad, has a hard back to it so your ipad snaps in to the case and the front of the case folds over the front, nicely. The cover also folds into a 'tri-fold' behind the casing so you can use it as a stand, too. I'm please with this purchase. It does what it says it will do.
customer_reviews.author: Just trying to help

customer_reviews.title: JETech iPad Air Case, good basic protection
customer_reviews.text: [ASIN:B00HRLUSRA JETech iPad Air Case Slim-Fit Smart Case Cover for Apple iPad Air iPad 5 with Auto Sleep/Wake Feature (Black)] This case was adequate for basic protection of my iPad Air. The texture of the case was a bit smooth for my grip, but the 'smart-close/standby' feature worked fine, it was slim and fit the iPad Air perfectly. The case/stand design could be more robust and more protection might be added for the bottom edge of the iPad. The seller was prompt in all replies, answered my queries and accepted my recommendations. A decent case for the price, for your iPad Air, as long as adults are handling it.
customer_reviews.author: DA

customer_reviews.title: OK  for the price but disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This case is a replacement that i got as a gift 5 years ago. That case had started to peel off the outer layer but still worked well. This case is well made but is thinner and does not support the iPad on a table. It is flimsy and holds the iPad at only a small range of angles. I This may not be a big deal with some users but is a definite draw back for me.
customer_reviews.author: Bethesda Dad

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: This case is GREAT. Fits the iPad Air 1 perfectly and even fits fine while using a glass screen protector. Works just like the Apple Smart Case (closing it locks the iPad) for a fraction of the cost. The quality seems fine and it feels good in the hand. I really like that it covers the back of the iPad as well. Perfect for putting in a backpack or brief case and not worrying about scratching the iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Zufall

customer_reviews.title: I am absolutely amazed with this product and how well It fit my ipad
customer_reviews.text: My last cover was an original Apple product which is very expensive. It started separating which made me look for a new one. I am absolutely amazed with this product and how well it fit my ipad. The material is smooth to the touch, has excellent cutouts for the buttons. The fit is perfect, it has a nice snap to it and the edges are a perfect height as you do not feel them at all. Couldn’t ask for anything manufactured so perfectly. The companies who make these additional accessories should be praised on what a good job they do. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie L. Denk

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for about 2 years now. I guess you get what you pay for. It’s a nice protecter but isn’t durable. After about 8-9 months I noticed that 2 of the edges started cracking. After about another 2-3 it then cracked all the way. I contacted the seller and they asked for a picture to be sent, I then sent the picture and with no delay they sent a new one to me.
customer_reviews.author: Marcelino Duarte

customer_reviews.title: Great Case at an Incredible Low Price. Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I am super fussy when it comes to my iPad cases. I admittedly avoided buying this one because I though the low price would mean low quality. Well, how pleasantly surprised I was when this one arrived at my doorstep. Built with the same quality, fit, and finish as cases four times the price. It fits perfectly and looks just as good as Apple own overpriced smart covers. Two months of use and it still looks brand new. I highly recommend this product. Fun colors too! Don't pass it up - this case is worthy!
customer_reviews.author: A. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: I love my new one
customer_reviews.text: I had to replace my old one (not sure if it was this brand or not, it was years ago) as the cover was peeling away from the magnetic part (just from so much use, not the cover's fault), leaving it exposed - and just worn out looking. I love my new one! I preferred a one piece cover (there are some that are two/three pieces to snap together), so I really like that this one is one piece. It's super simple to attach, and the quality is defnitely high/thick/sturdy. It's a matte color (I got red), and performs just as expected.
customer_reviews.author: ::Sara::

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Much better than the old one purchased at Apple store. MUCH Lower price, better quality, I like the different materials that were used, too. The one from Apple store was just plastic; this one has same kind of plastic on one side (as the old one) and kind of a fleece material on the side that covers/touches/protcts the screen. Good replacement cover for an older model iPad. I just don't know how it holds up as I just got it.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Ipad Case
customer_reviews.text: Great case, so far water proof is you accidentally spill something over the top or near the case. Wipes up great and if you have spots on the top you can use a wet cloth that it will clean up like nothing was even spilled on it. Love the fact that when I close it shuts down so the battery life isn't completely lost.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent light weight case
customer_reviews.text: This is an economical IPad cover that is well worth the cost.mit holds my IPad securely, makes all the buttons and the camera readily available, and is light weight. I bought it because it was the only IPad case that I found that listed model numbers. Many of the cases I saw were actually made for the Air 2, but it required a very close look to find that out. As the teo models are different sizes that's important. Because I was able to clearly match the numbers I was absolutely sure I had the right case. I could not be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Viewster

customer_reviews.title: Very thin and comfortable to hold and to carry.
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is thin and light. The red is very distinctive and not gaudy or girly either. I am very happy with my choice. The cutouts are all very precisely placed and it appears to have good corner protection. The material feels just slightly rubbery and feels very nice in my hands - not too slippery and not too rough - just right.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: It last a year
customer_reviews.text: It could be a great product but is made of low quality plastic. Low quality plastic is unable to withstand long term stress. This is the reason the corners that hold the iPad in place become craked in a year.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ossa

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: The cover was received the next day. It’s for my wife and she really likes it . The previous one was more cumbersome and not as easy to use. My opinion is that the PU material is far more functional than the faux leather , it is thinner, lighter and easier to carry and use. The magnetic sleep mode feature is also very nice. I would recommend this to anyone seeking to protect their IPad . I might get one for my Ipad Mini when my current one gets too beat up.
customer_reviews.author: Temptones

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: I've had this on my iPad for 2 years now and it still works great and hasn't broken down at all. Given that it has moving parts I would not have anticipated it would hold up this well with prolonged use. But I'm happy to say this has been very useful to me both in travel and with home entertainment
customer_reviews.author: blake

customer_reviews.title: poor protection?
customer_reviews.text: compared to my last case (leatherette probably- i thought i was buying a replacement) this case seems to afford very little protection as it's made of rigid plastic and i DOUBT the ipad would sustain a direct drop on concrete without damage with this case!! am i wrong? not confidence inspiring - was hoping for something much spongier
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Nice case for a low price
customer_reviews.text: Only complaint I had on this case was there was no instruction sheet to show how to use the "kickstand" part of the cover. Took me a couple tries and had to refer back to the pictures here on Amazon, but figured it out pretty quickly. My iPad is not high-use, maybe a couple times a week and I've only had this since about June, but seems to be holding up ok so far.
customer_reviews.author: Beth P.

customer_reviews.title: Chinese quality all the way
customer_reviews.text: Bought this case to replace the original one that I bought one Amazon. This one is poorly made compared to the old one. The magnet is so weak that it does not stay closed if you have the home button on the right side while holding iPad in your hand.. The seems are already starting to get thin, will likely fail by Christmas. For the price I did not expect much, and that’s what I got.
customer_reviews.author: HydraShok

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: It definitely gets the job done, and the fold up kickstand is really nice. The only thing I don't like about it is that the internal "felt" material (that faces the screen) tends to form little balls and leave lint on the screen. Aside from that, it's a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Floppy flap
customer_reviews.text: The quality is great, looks and feels like it is made to last and the iPad fits perfectly. BUT the front flap does not stay closed making the sleep mode to not work properly! Does not have the magnetic flap so it just flops open when you move or grab it! I noticed it coming on in my car from the bumps in the road at night I can see the iPad lighting up. I have to shut off the iPad when not using so it will not continuously go of and on.
customer_reviews.author: V. Mos

customer_reviews.title: It broke after about two weeks!!
customer_reviews.text: It's broken already. I've had this for a few weeks and it is cracked already. I m the type of person who,takes great care with all of their electronics. With that said I have not dropped or put any undue stress on my iPad and this case is cracked already. I will be skipping this brand in the future. My last case lasted over two years, not two weeks. I would skip this one if you are looking for something that lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Q

customer_reviews.title: Update - Cracked for no reason after a couple mongs... No longer: So far this is working great. Nice fit -
customer_reviews.text: Updated. Had to drop my rating on this. Was really happy at first. But even though my iPad sits on my desk and gets no abuse at all, no dropping, traveling etc. I noticed that part of the frame around a button has cracked. It isn't a spot that gets touched - just seems like poor materials. It is too bad this seemed like a great deal and was working well. Original: Bought this to replace a leather case that was a lot more expensive but fell apart. So far this is working great. Nice fit, good alignment, light, thin - just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Edo

customer_reviews.title: A rocky start but seller did tell me how to make it work by switching settings on my ipad.
customer_reviews.text: I edited my reviewed of this product. At first the cover didn't work at all (the auto shut off and shut on). Then I tried to return it and got an automated notice that the seller didn't accept returns of this item. I pushed a little harder and got in contact with the seller. Seller was very responsive and told me which settings to change to allow the cover to work. He also offered to take a return if the fix didn't work. The fix did work however.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: not sure not much use yet
customer_reviews.text: Totally NOT the colour shown foul dull dusty pale blue nothing at all like the picture would have chosen another colour if I had have known; on that alone one star. Has not had much use so to early to tell on the quality. I'll be back if it is total crap to let people know based on use not time.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my iPad cover. It is the second one I’ve purchased, and the only reason I had to replace the first one was because the underside lining became too dirty to clean because I have eight little grandchildren who all vie to play with grandma’s iPad! It’s a perfect fit. The magnetic closure, stand, and the auto sleep/wake function are all great features.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would have been great but stinks!
customer_reviews.text: Nice case but has a fishy odor to it- thought it would go away but hasnt after a month. Waited to write this review- sorry will not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: zj

customer_reviews.title: This will break on you
customer_reviews.text: The case fit my iPad Air nicely, but like many other reviewers, my case broke too. The bottom plastic corners snapped off and now the iPad falls out. I will have to buy another one now. I’m thinking I will look for a different material or another design.
customer_reviews.author: Katzanne

customer_reviews.title: We like the cover - Good Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: We like the cover. It's good. We had a similar cover before (bought somewhere else) and the plastic on side broke. But this looks much sturdier and better. Updated on 5/7/19: We had a small issue with this JETech Case for Apple iPad Air 1st Edition Smart Cover with Auto Wake/Sleep. I called JETech customer service. I did with Nick @ JETech. He was so helpful and provided me with all the details. Few questions asked and processed my replacement request which I got today. JETech Customer Service & Support is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Neal

customer_reviews.title: GET A BETTER CASE
customer_reviews.text: Barely fits on the iPad and will pop off easy. Cheaply made so start looking for a new case. I got this because I just wanted something to cover my iPad and to have a stand for it which it works fantastic for but if you’re looking for something durable and nice looks somewhere else this is some cheap stuff probably made in China
customer_reviews.author: FelixK9

customer_reviews.title: Great, affordable case!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this case for our 1st generation iPad Air. The case fits our iPad great. It’s made out of a plastic with a rubberized coating, which helps it to not slip. The magnet closure is a little weak but works. The stand is pretty sturdy. I haven’t been able to get the sleep/wake feature to work on my iPad yet, but it may be because we previously had the screen replaced. Overall, this is a great, affordable case that we’d definirelh recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Queen

customer_reviews.title: Good case, has some flaws.
customer_reviews.text: The case is a nice clean look, very simple. The problem I continue to run into is that the magnetic triangle stand will pop off on its own. It doesn't happen every time I use my iPad, but it has happened enough times since I got it that it is somewhat of an inconvenience. The magnet does work properly when you open and close the case, I have only had trouble with the stand part of the case.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Great for price but not the most stable
customer_reviews.text: The case is durable and fits the iPad Air perfectly. The on/off with cover closure works well. The only real issue is it is unstable when in reading mode due to the height of the iPad and the low height of the way the front cover folds. Otherwise it is a nice unit.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Wood

customer_reviews.title: I like that case enough to buy this one for my ...
customer_reviews.text: I first bought a similar case for iPad Air 2 which was a birthday gift from me. I like that case enough to buy this one for my iPad Air. It works well and looks good. My only complaint is that one corner of the cover does not stay flat/flush although it still manages to put the iPad to sleep. For the price, it is a minor issue,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Camera hole misaligned; returned
customer_reviews.text: Camera hole on my unit was not cut correctly; it was offset slightly and so covered part of the lens. Seems quite a few reviewers received units with the same issue. If you do get a defective unit, but you don't often take pictures with your iPad or don't mind removing the case to use the camera, this product may do the trick. I returned mine and got this one instead:I love it.
customer_reviews.author: MZS

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and construction, don’t forget the lifetime warranty like I did.
customer_reviews.text: Update, less than a year’s use and one of the whole plastic corners locking the case on to the tablet broke off. I choose to buy a second one, because the price is fair. When the new one arrived, I was reminded by a card inside of the lifetime warranty. So I might not have to have bough a new one. Hopefully this new one lasts longer. The quality of the construction seems well done. The fit is just right. So far, I’m very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Ken B

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit, Appearance and Reasonably Priced
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I have bought a device cover from this seller. This first was for my iPad Pro 10.5" (2017) And now for the new iPad Air 10.5" (2019) It fits great (snug) The wake feature is really reliable. And the appearance is great. I would buy again from this seller. Good Luck
customer_reviews.author: TurboTiger

customer_reviews.title: Shuts off when folded back?? !!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this case, EXCEPT when I open it and fold back the case it shuts off the tablet as though I was closing it. I then noticed other reviewers said the same thing. Other than this, I’d love it. However this issue is for sure a deal breaker. I have to send this case back.
customer_reviews.author: Macy

customer_reviews.title: Functional and inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: This case replaced my failing, but expensive, Apple front cover. I also had a clear rear snap-on cover. This single unit gives similar protection for about 1/4 the cost of my previous solution. While the back has a pleasing feel similar to the Apple unit, the front has a decidedly cheap plasticy feel to it. But the magnetic on/off function works fine, and it gives me a decent grip, and protects the screen. The trifold front also works slightly better than the original Apple unit, mostly because it's attached to the rear instead of magnet to the side. Bottom line, cheap and functional.
customer_reviews.author: M. Neubauer

customer_reviews.title: Good design but poor material
customer_reviews.text: It’s the perfect case I was looking for my ipad. This is my second one. The first one I bought about six months back. A few days back I noticed that two corners had broken and the iPad was falling out of the case. I really like the case and it’s design. But very disappointed that it didn’t last six mo this. I’m hoping the second one would last longer.
customer_reviews.author: BG

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this case three times. The first case lasted for a long time until it broke. The corners on the last two cases broke rather quickly. I did not drop the ipad so I am not sure what is causing the problem. I will not buy this case again.
customer_reviews.author: Jellybird

customer_reviews.title: Great iPad cover replacement
customer_reviews.text: This iPad cover fits perfectly. It was simple to swap out with my over-used cover which was falling apart
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Good Case for the iPad First Edition
customer_reviews.text: The case arrived right on time. It fit my iPad Air first edition perfectly. The pad clicks into the case tightly and appears to be very secure. I do miss a place to put my stylus because my previous case had a little loop for that. Other than that, the case is fine and it looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Arnold W

customer_reviews.title: Good value and works well!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this 2 or 3 times now. I don’t know whether I’m hard on things or it’s flimsy. It breaks on the same corner every time. I only have to buy it once a year so it’s still a good value and worth it. It’s definitely enough to keep your old safe.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: It fits!
customer_reviews.text: I was apprehensive ordering an iPad Air cover on line because I was afraid that it wouldn’t fit. There are so many models and covers out there that one little overlook could mean a misfitting cover. I was happy that not only did the cover fit my older iPad Air, but the color was true to the picture.
customer_reviews.author: karen j smrdu

customer_reviews.title: Would not get this one again
customer_reviews.text: eh, nothing great, feels good in my hand. But there seems to be a major flaw. The areas around the buttons are thin where it is next to the bezel. They crack very easy. Now it has a very rough feeling where the plastic broke off. Both areas broke within the first week. I may snip off the remaining pieces and sand it smooth. Bad design that is pretty obvious. With all they have sold this has had come up in the past and they don't seem to think it's worth fixing. Uodate, cracks have formed in the back, time to replace.
customer_reviews.author: Pomfritz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This a update to a previous review, the product is a great fit but it does not last. The retention corner plastic has broken on 3 sides and will not keep the i pad secure, The i pad did get dropped 1 time from my lap to the carpet but you would think it would be able to with stand that impact. I have a case similar to this on a mini i pad that has been on there for 2 years and thought it was the same one, obviously not.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Gillman

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Dad this time. I was using exact same one for the past year. the case is durable, slim and good quality. It works well as a basic case. For the price, it worths the money. The case works well as a stand and also sleep mode works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Great value, material, design, and color.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good value. The case is a perfect fit for my iPad. It is identical in shape and design as the Apple leather case (I paid $99 for that new), but costs about 10x less. It is a plastic/polymer case, but is still soft, but a little bit stiffer than the original leather case. Overall, I am very satisfied with the purchase and my iPad "looks like new" again!
customer_reviews.author: Family of Five

customer_reviews.title: Good, affordable protection for a Gen. 1 iPad Air
customer_reviews.text: My iPad Air 1 snapped into the case firmly but easily. Looks like good protection. Built-in stand is like others I've seen: just adequate for use on a solid level surface. I could not tell if the sleep feature was working, seemed not to be.
customer_reviews.author: Marc99

customer_reviews.title: This is a very cheap case. I have had ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cheap case. I have had 2 of them and they both just slowly fell apart. The second one I got started to fall apart within 2 weeks of getting it. What happens is the plastic starts to crack and small pieces start to fall off until it gets to a point that it will no longer hold the iPad. That's what happened to my first one and now that this one is doing the same thing I just went and spent the money on the apple brand one.
customer_reviews.author: i aye i aye i

customer_reviews.title: Good fit on iPad air version one.
customer_reviews.text: Fits on the iPad perfectly (first version, not air 2 or newer) and certainly protects the tablet though, like all good cases, really adds to the overall bulk of the iPad. Too new to say anything about durability but the material certainly feels good. The main flap has the magnet to wake up the pad when opened, or make it snooze when the flap is closed. Nice.
customer_reviews.author: ScotInTex

customer_reviews.title: Well made iPad case.
customer_reviews.text: Bought case for my husband’s iPad Air, 1sr edition. It fits perfectly and seems very sturdy. The back seems much stronger than the other brand we replaced which had a clear plastic back that cracked and broke within several months after purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Didnt Work Like I Thought.
customer_reviews.text: I received this case and was excited to get it open. Its very slim, and fits very nicely. However my biggest issue which I was going to think was a positive with the smart cover, however when you fold it back to make it more comfortable in your hand it turns it off, so the best possible way to hold this case and in order to make it feel good in your hands won't work. This is what caused me to rate it only 2 stars, the design in a flaw in my opinion. Maybe it was just an issue with mine but however I sent it back and received my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. Overall the quality seems good. I have the iPad air and the camera hole is not in the right place and covers up part of the lens. Also, the back is very hard with extremely little friction, so a lot of times when I try to pick it up it will slip and fall back down. Most annoying that I need two hands to pick it up off a wood surface. Other than that the product works as advertised, just a bit annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Swirsky

customer_reviews.title: Simple and useful
customer_reviews.text: Decided against a heavier keyboard case like I had previously that broke at the hinge. This simple case is perfect to protect iPad. Easy folding cover doubles as a support to hold while reading. Hardly know the cover is on the iPad. Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsonhoff

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend this case and will need to replace mine soon
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case about 6 months ago. I have only used it lightly at work and at home but have never dropped or scraped it. A corner piece has broken and the soft green part has faded considerably. The green on the plastic doesn't match the green soft piece either. Would not recommend this case and will need to replace mine soon.
customer_reviews.author: Nikkandy

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Gotta love generic forms for ratings, so here goes. Material quality: The material has a great feel to it and helps grip. Battery Life: Gave it 5 stars because if it did have batteries, I'm sure they would last a long time. Durability: I've had it 4 days and it hasn't broken. Love it! If this changes, I'll be sure to complain.
customer_reviews.author: Plods with Beer

customer_reviews.title: Get the right model & be happy!
customer_reviews.text: The item we purchased is an iPad cover for one of the original iPad models. Once we determined the Model # number we had, an order was placed. Since Apple has produced many varieties and versions of the iPad, you must take time to insure you are ordering the model that does correspond to the one you have or else you're stuck with a return. Remove the old cover, get a magnifying glass, and look under the Apple logo. We received the correct cover for our model.
customer_reviews.author: Major Major

customer_reviews.title: Cover doesn’t fit, but could be my fault
customer_reviews.text: (2) things, I ordered what I thought was the correct cover for the very first iPad that came out. It doesn’t fit correctly and(2)did not come with the Pointer. BUT since we only use this iPad occasionally, Not worth the time/trouble to return!
customer_reviews.author: patricia torchia

customer_reviews.title: Great product. IPad fits snug
customer_reviews.text: Great product. IPad fits snug. It does take a bit of doing to get the IPad in the cover, but I am extremely pleased with it. I will mention that I am elderly, so as not to take away from the product's ability to perform, in reference to my comment about the product being a bit of a challenge to get the IPad in the case. I assume some youngster would have no problem with it. Buy the product, you will not regret it, and I like its ability to be upright by use of the flap/cover. Thanks, Jim
customer_reviews.author: J.P.

customer_reviews.title: I think this case is one of the best fitting cases available
customer_reviews.text: I think this case is one of the best fitting cases available. It lasted longer than apples 2 piece leather case. Only reason 4 stars is theirs no fabric lining inside the lower part and the magnet is a little week when you stand case up vertically. By for ten bucks you I shouldn't complain. I'd be willing to pay more for these added features. I have had 5 iPads and six jet tech case and will continue too use them as long as quality is there. Wish they made a similar case for my MacBook Pro.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice but does not stand up
customer_reviews.text: This case is nice for my iPad Air model 1. Fits perfect, feels good. but it is only for folding all the way back and holding the iPad in your hand. The cover is supposed to fold and allow you to stand the iPad so you can view it. The case cover is too loose at the folds that it is not strong enough to stay standing up. This is fine with me. my iPad Air is so light that it is ok.
customer_reviews.author: Jim in Sacramento

customer_reviews.title: For the price, it’s fine
customer_reviews.text: . It’s very light weight so we’ll see how it handles a 2 year old. I should have spent more for something more heavy duty and with a strap to hold it closed, and a firmer support when folding the back to hold it up. Not the products fault
customer_reviews.author: Susan Reardon

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: was delivered quickly and packaged nicely. Have only had it a couple of weeks and so far seems to be doing the job. Time will tell regarding the durability of the product. It is quite inexpensive, so I do not expect it will last for years, but fits my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Dan B.

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: I was wanting to replace a "leather" Apple iPad smart cover which is finally starting to come apart. This looks just like the original, fits really well, and is exactly what I was looking for - except that I don't like the feel of the the back cover (according to the specs this is PU+PC). I think others are ok with it so this is just a personal thing. The item itself is otherwise great. Just wondering whether to spend $$ to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Jasper

product_meta.title: JETech Case for Apple iPad Air 1st Edition (NOT for iPad Air 2), Smart Cover with Auto Wake/Sleep, Black
feature_bullets: Designed for iPad Air 1st Edition. NOT compatible with iPad Air 2. Fit iPad Models: A1474/A1475/A1476. Please check back bottom of your iPad to find the model number
Made with PU+PC. Slim/light design. Synthetic exterior and smooth interior provide comprehensive protection for your iPad
Magnetic smart cover supports automatic sleep/wake function.The tri-fold front cover can support iPad in two standing position for viewing and typing
Easy access to all the controls and features; Perfect cutouts for speakers, camera and other ports
Package includes: iPad Air case, customer service card

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars22,873 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
